version_description:
- Fixed audio quality transmitted via bluetooth connection
- Fixed prefix issue on registration using phone number
- Stability improvement

- Optimised API for lighter and speedier experience
- Optimised UI rendering
- Stability improvement
The latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements.

This update contains:
• Screen improvements
• Hyperlink implementation on live chat, podcast comment, and direct message
• Bugfix

• 10" forward & backward feature on Podcast player
• Hyperlink enabled on messaging
• Improvement of performance
• Kamu bisa mengakses halaman Musik dan Podcast langsung dari menu Cari.
Some bugs are fixed in this version.

Thank you for using Noice. There are new features that will make Noice even more exciting, let's have a look here:
1. Audiobooks - Collections of non-fiction that are ready to enlarge your insights
2. Like and dislike comments feature - You can give a like directly for comment that you love or dislike them if they are annoying.
3. Notification center - Don't worry about missing your favorite contents because we will give you notifications that collected in one place and you can choose which one you want to show
Last but not least Noice more stable than before. Happy listening.
